name: Which emoji is most used?
description:
Do you think you know which emoticons are most used?

Check how much you know about emoticons in this fun game about emojis.

▶ Infinite levels

▶ Increasing difficulty

▶ Get the highest score

▶ Beat your record

▶ Play offline

▶ Totally free

▶ New game modes coming soon

---

Emojis on Twitter: https://twemoji.twitter.com/
